structure.unit: Registration Of Certain Professions And Occupations

law.catch_line: Determination Of Services As Practice Of Architecture; Finality; Fraud
law.text: The determination of any person, or of any officer, board or commission of the commonwealth or of any political subdivision thereof, who makes a contract to have services performed for him or it, that the principal services to be performed thereunder involve the practice of architecture, shall be final, unless said determination was made in bad faith, or was fraudulent, capricious or arbitrary.
